channel.title: justice on It's the Travis Amiel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in justice on It's the Travis Amiel Blog

item.title: Since May
item.description: A lot of my time has been spent in video calls. This blog post titled ‘Power Dynamics and Inclusion in Virtual Meetings’ reminds me of the multitudes of ways people come to technology. We all have different needs and understandings regarding the way our world, infrustructure, and platforms work. Since the end of May, I’ve been retweeting-as-expression vis-Ã -vis abolition, systemic + institutional oppression, racism, transphobia, decolonization, sexual assult, and journaling about it.
